rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0010
rows.name: Good work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0020
rows.name:
We moved the Ares to the restricted hangar
to have it checked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0030
rows.name: Now then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0040
rows.name: Since the Ghosts decided to give the Vita some lovin',[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0050
rows.name:
does that mean they consider the Ganglion
to be a bigger threat than us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0060
rows.name: Ghosts don't have that kind of independence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0070
rows.name:
They swarm whatever happens to be in front of them,
like iron filings drawn to a magnet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0080
rows.name: You can think of them as a force of nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0090
rows.name: The conclusion my world's scientists arrived at was this:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0100
rows.name: "Ghosts are, in essence, the universe's corrective system."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0110
rows.name: End quote.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0120
rows.name: A system?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0130
rows.name: I think I get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0140
rows.name:
Like animals' instincts?
Nature's way of protecting itselfâ€”is it that kind of thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0150
rows.name: "And the sixth angel sounded, and I heard a voice...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0160
rows.name:
"from the four horns of the golden altar
which is before God, saying...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0170
rows.name: "to the sixth angel which had the trumpet,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0180
rows.name:
"Loose the four angels which are bound in the
great river Euphrates. And the four angels...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0190
rows.name: "were loosed,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0200
rows.name:
"which were prepared for an hour, and a day,
and a month, and a year,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0210
rows.name:
"for to slay the third part of men." 
Sound familiar? You might've heard it...in some shape or form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0220
rows.name: Y-yeah, that's...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0230
rows.name:
That's some heavy stuff.
And coming from you, it sounds all the heavier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0240
rows.name:
It's from an Earth text,
passed down on your world since antiquity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0250
rows.name: When I first read it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0260
rows.name:
it felt to me like a kind of forewarning,
a moral teaching from which to learn...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0270
rows.name: And what, now you think it was a prophecy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0280
rows.name: I think it's historical record.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0290
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0300
rows.name: Well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0310
rows.name:
Suppose the people of the past knew
of the existence of such a system...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0320
rows.name:
You're saying Ghosts are angels of
the apocalypse?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0330
rows.name: Get real.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0340
rows.name: Then god is real too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0350
rows.name: It would align with the facts at hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0360
rows.name: Gods and angels...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0370
rows.name: Before, I would've laughed you right outta town.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0390
rows.name: Well, either way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0400
rows.name:
If the Ghosts are chasing the Ganglion,
that's good news for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0410
rows.name: If I learn anything else, I'll let you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0420
rows.name: For now, rest up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0430
rows.name: Will do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0440
rows.name: Al. You're going straight to medical.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0450
rows.name: I'm healthy as a horse, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0460
rows.name: That's what worries me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0470
rows.name: C'mon, back me up here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31120100_MSG0480
rows.name: Stop moaning.[ST:wait ]
